Sharing our Product Hunt! What do pro copywriters think of this?

Get a ‘grade’ for your cold emails, and some suggestions for how to improve!

<http://producthunt.com/posts/cold-email-grader>

attachments.title: Cold Email Grader - Send better cold emails with AI-powered feedback For free | Product Hunt
attachments.text: Those cold email templates from Google won’t cut it. Cold Email Grader is a simple app for getting specific feedback on your outbound emails. Get tips on your subject, body, mechanics and deliverability. The more you test, the smarter our ML algorithm gets.
attachments.fallback: Product Hunt: Cold Email Grader - Send better cold emails with AI-powered feedback For free | Product Hunt

text: Someone on my sales team found this and shared with our full sales team, so they found it helpful for sure!

elements.text: Someone on my sales team found this and shared with our full sales team, so they found it helpful for sure!

text:
I know I'm a little late, but want to echo <@UUXMCJQ15>. Although Ahrefs is $50 more than your budget, when used effectively you should get well more than $100/month of value from it.

When looking at tools for my business/work, I look at the amount of productive work I can get out of it as opposed to the sticker price.

For example, with Adobe Creative Cloud, it's $50/month, but by doing basic graphics tasks myself, I typically save $300/month over sourcing out everything.

elements.text: I know I'm a little late, but want to echo

text:
Hey <@U014RK24F9D> looks promising. Speaking from experience at a previous employer (Kahuna), we developed a similar solution for email subject lines but our minimum retainer kept the solution only accessible to companies like Skyscanner and Dillards.

The main difference is that customers would supply campaign data to us, and we would train our model to specifically work to their campaigns. It was a cumbersome process and unfortunately Kahuna Subject Line never took off.

I know you might not have the budget for enterprise grade solutions but check out <https://www.persado.com/>

They're a leader in the space, and when I worked at Kahuna, prospects told our Sales teams they paid Persado thousands to test a single email - so our $10k/retainer was a steal to them.

While I haven't directly used Persado or Cold Email Grader - I can say that AI/ML can really drive results - and this is based on what I saw in 2018. I'm sure it's evolved quite a bit since then.

attachments.title: Words Matter - Persado
attachments.text: Persado is the AI platform of reference for the choice of words across the enterprise. Companies gain quantifiable business impact and data-driven insights to identify the trends and language that win every moment in the customer journey while ensuring the message always reinforces brand voice.
